ValidationRule.description: Prevent users from changing the related product if order has already been sent to JDE. This rule applies for special orders
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($User.BypassVR__c), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'In progress'), Send_to_ERP__c = true, NOT(ISCHANGED(Send_to_ERP__c)), ISPICKVAL(ApplicationSource__c, 'SPO'), ISCHANGED(SPO_SpecialOrderSKUCodeRef__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The order has already been sent to JDE. You can no longer change the related product.
